TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {193479=Bharat Rasayan is in the Pesticides & Agro Chemicals sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 503.26 crore. The company management includes S N Gupta - Chairman & Managing Director, M P Gupta - Whole Time Director, R P Gupta - Whole Time Director, V K Sharma - Executive Director, Pankaj Gupta - Ind. Non-Executive Director, Ram Kanwar - Ind. Non-Executive Director, Amit Gupta - Ind. Non-Executive Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 590021 and the NSE with an NSE Code of BHARATRAS. Its Registered office is at Vikram Tower, 1501, Rajendra Place., New Delhi,Delhi - 110008.
